meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by indecency or lewdness
meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes became bawdier as the night went on.
meanings.sent2: The movie had some bawdier scenes that were not suitable for children.
meanings.sent3: The bawdier comments made everyone blush and giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her bawdier sense of humor always kept the conversation lively.
meanings.sent5: The bawdier language used in the play shocked the audience.

meanings.definition: More indecent or lewd than something else
meanings.sent1: The new show was even bawdier than the previous one.
meanings.sent2: His jokes were bawdier than hers, causing some discomfort in the room.
meanings.sent3: The bawdier costume at the party raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The gossip about her was getting bawdier by the minute.
meanings.sent5: The bawdier content of the magazine made it unsuitable for young readers.
